EmailTemplate.name: 201904_Americas_Event_GoDirect_CustomerAdvisory_mih.201904_Americas_Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: 2019 Honeywell GoDirect Customer Advisory Board Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the 2019 Honeywell GoDirect Customer Advisory Board Meeting. Please save this email for future reference.
Where: Honeywell Technology Experience Center 101 Constitution Ave NW, Suite 500 West Washington, DC 20001-2177
When:
- Monday, June 10 – Welcome Cocktail Reception - Tuesday, June 11 – Meeting and Dinner - Wednesday, June 12 – Meeting (ends at noon)
We look forward to seeing you in June!
Sincerely, Honeywell GoDirect Team godirect@honeywell.com <[[mailto:godirect@honeywell.com]]>
